entry.title: Electrum mailing list
entry.summary: The provided link takes you to the sign-up page for electrum-discuss, a mailing list dedicated to discussing Electrum, an open-source Bitcoin wallet. This mailing list provides a platform for users to discuss their experiences, address issues and suggest improvements or new features. Electrum is designed to be fast, lightweight, and easy to use, making it a popular choice in the Bitcoin community. The mailing list offers a valuable resource for those interested in learning more about this wallet and staying up-to-date with the latest developments. By subscribing to the mailing list, members can participate in discussions, ask questions, and share their knowledge with others. The list is moderated to ensure that all conversations remain respectful and on-topic, creating a positive environment for learning and collaboration. Overall, electrum-discuss is an excellent resource for anyone interested in learning more about Electrum and engaging with other members of the Bitcoin community. By joining the mailing list, users gain access to a wealth of information and support that can help them make the most of this popular Bitcoin wallet.
